name: Mark Padilla
bio: A fourth-year Computer Science student at the University of Toronto. Makes user-focused software for mobile and web. Currently in love with Flutter. A bookworm and write-aholic with an ear for soundtracks and Celtic music.

name: Aradhya Kunwar
bio: A senior student at UofT majoring in Computer Science. Has a niche for building web APIs and backend systems. Currently exploring the vastness of Node.js. Enjoys playing soccer both on the console and the turf.
